patthana22.23:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
patthana22.23:0.3_0: And the caused and reason for this.
patthana22.23:3.1_0: for the sake of wrong understanding, not for the sake of cause negligence.
patthana22.23:5.1_0: Nor does the basis for the path that gives rise to the support.
patthana22.23:7.1_0: But they don’t arise because of arisen they’re not for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana22.23:7.1_1: No cause is the reason why the arising of listening to the teaching hasn’t arisen in the teaching.
patthana22.23:7.1_2: No cause or condition for the arising of what has not arisen.
patthana22.23:8.1_0: There are three supports for three reasons: relying on letting go, the three supports, and three experiences the path to the next life. There are those who don’t understand the path to pass away and reappearing.
